title: Enhancing System Design Practical Competencies: Strengthening Science Teaching Methods Through Online Wisdom Community Design

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can build a community of practice related to science education using online collaboration tools.
Learners can conduct collaborative problem-solving projects with peer teachers based on social constructivism.
Learners can enhance science instructional design competencies by over 20% by incorporating formative assessment feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
